channel.title: A Software Distopia on Eddie Abbondanzio
channel.description: Recent content in A Software Distopia on Eddie Abbondanzio

item.title: Self-Driving Microtransactions
item.description: You’re late for work. Again. You pack up your belongings and run out the door, barely stopping to kiss your wife goodbye. Outside of your apartment the air is cool. The tiring heat of summer has begun to wean off for the year and the chills of fall slowly start arriving each morning.
